reviews.review_msg: Jeremy is a good prof as long as you also put in the work. If you go up to him during his office hours he will actually take the time to make sure you understood the material before moving on. Jeremy's tests can be a little tricky at times but as long as you do all the assigned homework and IQs you will be well prepared for the final
He started out badly but once he found out to slow down on examples he got much much better. Hard class, but he does a good job
